cards.name: Animus
cards.desc: A generator of Red Replicase, a biological resource for many creatures.
cards.rules: Provides 2 Red per turn. Unspent Red is lost between turns.

cards.name: Blastforge
cards.desc: Strong Behemium ingots are used in durable machinery plating, but must be formed quickly while fresh from the forge.
cards.rules: Gain 1 Blue, unused Blue is lost between turns.

cards.name: Conduit
cards.desc: Synthesizing Gaussite has its benefits. The material, while not too sturdy, stores easily.
cards.rules: {$Fragile} Gain 1 green, which is saved between turns.
